Non-elemental Boost.name: Non-elemental Boost
Non-elemental Boost.description: +10 Attack if the Ramped-Up weapon has no element.

Fire I.name: Fire I
Fire I.description: Sets weapon element to Fire and adds +10 to its value.

Fire II.name: Fire II
Fire II.description: Sets weapon element to Fire and adds +15 to its value.

Fire III.name: Fire III
Fire III.description: Sets weapon element to Fire and adds +20 to its value, but reduces attack by 5.

Fire IV.name: Fire IV
Fire IV.description: Sets weapon element to Fire and adds +30 to its value, but reduces attack by 10.

Water I.description: Sets weapon element to Water and adds +10 to its value.

Water IV.name: Water IV

Thunder II.description: Sets weapon element to Thunder and adds +15 to its value.

Thunder III.description: Sets weapon element to Thunder and adds +20 to its value, but reduces attack by 5.

Thunder IV.name: Thunder IV
Thunder IV.description: Sets weapon element to Thunder and adds +30 to its value, but reduces attack by 10.

Dragon IV.name: Dragon IV
Dragon IV.description: Sets weapon element to Dragon and adds +30 to its value, but reduces attack by 10.

Poison I.name: Poison I
Poison I.description: Sets weapon element to Poison and adds +10 to its value.

Poison II.name: Poison II
Poison II.description: Sets weapon element to Poison and adds +20 to its value, but reduces Attack by 10.

Poison III.name: Poison III
Poison III.description: Sets weapon element to Poison and adds +30 to its value, but reduces Attack by 20.

Sleep II.description: Sets weapon element to Sleep and adds +12 to its value, but reduces Attack by 10.

Sleep III.name: Sleep III
Sleep III.description: Sets weapon element to Sleep and adds +15 to its value, but reduces Attack by 20.

Blast I.name: Blast I
Blast I.description: Sets weapon element to Blast and adds +10 to its value.

Blast II.name: Blast II
Blast II.description: Sets weapon element to Blast and adds +15 to its value, but reduces Attack by 10.

Blast III.name: Blast III
Blast III.description: Sets weapon element to Blast and adds +20 to its value, but reduces Attack by 20.

Sharpness Type I.name: Sharpness Type I
Sharpness Type I.description: Modifies the sharpness of Ramped-Up weapons.

Sharpness Type II.name: Sharpness Type II
Sharpness Type II.description: Modifies the sharpness of Ramped-Up weapons.

Sharpness Type III.name: Sharpness Type III
Sharpness Type III.description: Modifies the sharpness of Ramped-Up weapons, but reduces Attack by 10.

Sharpness Type IV.name: Sharpness Type IV
Sharpness Type IV.description: Modifies the sharpness of Ramped-Up weapons, but reduces Attack by 20.

Secondary: Fire I.name: Secondary: Fire I
Secondary: Fire I.description: Sets a non-Fire weapon's sub element to Fire and adds +10 to its value.

Secondary: Fire II.name: Secondary: Fire II
Secondary: Fire II.description: Sets a non-Fire weapon's sub element to Fire and adds +20 to its value, as well as +5 to the primary element.

Secondary: Fire III.name: Secondary: Fire III
Secondary: Fire III.description: Sets a non-Fire weapon's sub element to Fire and adds +30 to its value, as well as +10 to the primary element.

Secondary: Water I.name: Secondary: Water I
Secondary: Water I.description: Sets a non-Water weapon's sub element to Water and adds +10 to its value.

Secondary: Water II.name: Secondary: Water II
Secondary: Water II.description: Sets a non-Water weapon's sub element to Water and adds +20 to its value, as well as +5 to the primary element.

Secondary: Water III.name: Secondary: Water III
Secondary: Water III.description: Sets a non-Water weapon's sub element to Water and adds +30 to its value, as well as +10 to the primary element.

Secondary: Thunder I.name: Secondary: Thunder I
Secondary: Thunder I.description: Sets a non-Thunder weapon's sub element to Thunder and adds +10 to its value.

Secondary: Thunder II.name: Secondary: Thunder II
Secondary: Thunder II.description: Sets a non-Thunder weapon's sub element to Thunder and adds +20 to its value, as well as +5 to the primary element.

Secondary: Thunder III.name: Secondary: Thunder III
Secondary: Thunder III.description: Sets a non-Thunder weapon's sub element to Thunder and adds +30 to its value, as well as +10 to the primary element.

Secondary: Ice I.name: Secondary: Ice I
Secondary: Ice I.description: Sets a non-Ice weapon's sub element to Ice and adds +10 to its value.

Secondary: Ice II.name: Secondary: Ice II
Secondary: Ice II.description: Sets a non-Ice weapon's sub element to Ice and adds +20 to its value, as well as +5 to the primary element.

Secondary: Ice III.name: Secondary: Ice III
Secondary: Ice III.description: Sets a non-Ice weapon's sub element to Ice and adds +30 to its value, as well as +10 to the primary element.

Secondary: Dragon I.name: Secondary: Dragon I
Secondary: Dragon I.description: Sets a non-Dragon weapon's sub element to Dragon and adds +10 to its value.

Secondary: Dragon II.name: Secondary: Dragon II
Secondary: Dragon II.description: Sets a non-Dragon weapon's sub element to Dragon and adds +20 to its value, as well as +5 to the primary element.

Secondary: Dragon III.name: Secondary: Dragon III
Secondary: Dragon III.description: Sets a non-Dragon weapon's sub element to Dragon and adds +30 to its value, as well as +10 to the primary element.

Wyrmstake Boost.name: Wyrmstake Boost
Wyrmstake Boost.description: Raises the Wyrmstake Cannon's damage level by 1.

Shelling: Normal I.name: Shelling: Normal I
Shelling: Normal I.description: Sets shelling type to Normal and shelling level to Level 3.

Shelling: Normal II.name: Shelling: Normal II
Shelling: Normal II.description: Sets shelling type to Normal and shelling level to Level 4.

Shelling: Normal III.name: Shelling: Normal III
Shelling: Normal III.description: Sets shelling type to Normal and shelling level to Level 5.

Shelling: Long I.name: Shelling: Long I
Shelling: Long I.description: Sets shelling type to Long and shelling level to Level 3.

Shelling: Long II.name: Shelling: Long II
Shelling: Long II.description: Sets shelling type to Long and shelling level to Level 4.

Shelling: Long III.name: Shelling: Long III
Shelling: Long III.description: Sets shelling type to Long and shelling level to Level 5.

Shelling: Wide I.name: Shelling: Wide I
Shelling: Wide I.description: Sets shelling type to Wide and shelling level to Level 3.

Shelling: Wide II.name: Shelling: Wide II
Shelling: Wide II.description: Sets shelling type to Wide and shelling level to Level 4.

Shelling: Wide III.name: Shelling: Wide III
Shelling: Wide III.description: Sets shelling type to Wide and shelling level to Level 5.

Resilient Melody I.name: Resilient Melody I
Resilient Melody I.description: Enables performances that nullify status ailments.

Resilient Melody II.name: Resilient Melody II
Resilient Melody II.description: Enables performances that nullify status ailments.

Phial: Power.name: Phial: Power
Phial: Power.description: Changes equipped phial to a Power Phial, but reduces Attack by 10.

Phial: Element.name: Phial: Element
Phial: Element.description: Changes equipped phial to an element phial.

Phial: Poison I.name: Phial: Poison I
Phial: Poison I.description: Changes equipped phial to a Poison Phial, and adds +20 to the phial's element.

Phial: Poison II.name: Phial: Poison II
Phial: Poison II.description: Changes equipped phial to a Poison Phial, and adds +25 to the phial's element.

Phial: Poison III.name: Phial: Poison III
Phial: Poison III.description: Changes equipped phial to a Poison Phial, and adds +30 to the phial's element.

Phial: Paralysis I.name: Phial: Paralysis I
Phial: Paralysis I.description: Changes equipped phial to a Paralysis Phial, and adds +15 to the phial's element.

Phial: Paralysis II.name: Phial: Paralysis II
Phial: Paralysis II.description: Changes equipped phial to a Paralysis Phial, and adds +20 to the phial's element.

Phial: Paralysis III.name: Phial: Paralysis III
Phial: Paralysis III.description: Changes equipped phial to a Paralysis Phial, and adds +25 to the phial's element.

Phial: Dragon I.name: Phial: Dragon I
Phial: Dragon I.description: Changes equipped phial to a Dragon phial, and adds +20 to the phial's element.

Phial: Dragon II.name: Phial: Dragon II
Phial: Dragon II.description: Changes equipped phial to a Dragon phial, and adds +25 to the phial's element.

Phial: Dragon III.name: Phial: Dragon III
Phial: Dragon III.description: Changes equipped phial to a Dragon phial, and adds +30 to the phial's element.

Phial: Exhaust I.name: Phial: Exhaust I
Phial: Exhaust I.description: Changes equipped phial to an Exhaust Phial, and adds +20 to the phial's element attack.

Phial: Exhaust II.name: Phial: Exhaust II
Phial: Exhaust II.description: Changes equipped phial to an Exhaust Phial, and adds +30 to the phial's element attack.

Phial: Exhaust III.name: Phial: Exhaust III
Phial: Exhaust III.description: Changes equipped phial to an Exhaust Phial, and adds +40 to the phial's element attack.

Kinsect Level Boost III.name: Kinsect Level Boost III
Kinsect Level Boost III.description: Raises Kinsect Level to Level 6, but reduces Attack by 10.

Kinsect Level Boost IV.name: Kinsect Level Boost IV
Kinsect Level Boost IV.description: Raises Kinsect Level to Level 7, but reduces Attack by 20.

Recoil Down Surge.name: Recoil Down Surge
Recoil Down Surge.description: Decreases recoil by 2 but increases deviation by 1.

Reload Speed Surge.name: Reload Speed Surge
Reload Speed Surge.description: Increases reload speed by 2 but also increases recoil by 1.

Steadiness Surge.name: Steadiness Surge
Steadiness Surge.description: Decreases deviation by 2 but also decreases reload speed by 1.

Normal Effect I.name: Normal Effect I
Normal Effect I.description: Enables loading of Level 2 Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

Normal Effect II.name: Normal Effect II
Normal Effect II.description: Enables loading of all levels of ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

Pierce Effect I.name: Pierce Effect I
Pierce Effect I.description: Enables loading of Pierce Ammo 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

Pierce Effect II.name: Pierce Effect II
Pierce Effect II.description: Enables loading of all Pierce Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

Spread Effect I.name: Spread Effect I
Spread Effect I.description: Enables loading of Spread Ammo 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

Spread Effect II.name: Spread Effect II
Spread Effect II.description: Enables loading of all Spread Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

Shrapnel Effect I.name: Shrapnel Effect I
Shrapnel Effect I.description: Enables loading of Shrapnel Ammo 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

Shrapnel Effect II.name: Shrapnel Effect II
Shrapnel Effect II.description: Enables loading of all Shrapnel Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

Sticky Effect I.name: Sticky Effect I
Sticky Effect I.description: Enables loading of Sticky Ammo 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

Sticky Effect II.name: Sticky Effect II
Sticky Effect II.description: Enables loading of all Sticky Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

Cluster Effect I.name: Cluster Effect I
Cluster Effect I.description: Enables loading of Cluster Bombs 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

Cluster Effect II.name: Cluster Effect II
Cluster Effect II.description: Enables loading of all Cluster Bombs, and increases ammo capacity.

Add: Normal Ammo I.name: Add: Normal Ammo I
Add: Normal Ammo I.description: Expands weapon ammo capacity for normal ammo.

Add: Normal Ammo II.name: Add: Normal Ammo II
Add: Normal Ammo II.description: Expands weapon ammo capacity for normal ammo.

Sticky/Cluster Effect I.name: Sticky/Cluster Effect I
Sticky/Cluster Effect I.description: Enables loading of Sticky Ammo and Cluster Bombs, and changes ammo capacity.

Sticky/Cluster Effect II.name: Sticky/Cluster Effect II
Sticky/Cluster Effect II.description: Enables loading of Sticky Ammo and Cluster Bombs, and changes ammo capacity.

Fire Effect I.name: Fire Effect I
Fire Effect I.description: Enables loading of Flaming Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Fire Effect II.name: Fire Effect II
Fire Effect II.description: Enables loading of Flaming Ammo and Piercing Fire Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Water Effect I.name: Water Effect I
Water Effect I.description: Enables loading of Water Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Water Effect II.name: Water Effect II
Water Effect II.description: Enables loading of Water Ammo and Piercing Water Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Thunder Effect I.name: Thunder Effect I
Thunder Effect I.description: Enables loading of Thunder Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Thunder Effect II.name: Thunder Effect II
Thunder Effect II.description: Enables loading of Thunder Ammo and Piercing Thunder Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Ice Effect I.name: Ice Effect I
Ice Effect I.description: Enables loading of Freeze Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Ice Effect II.name: Ice Effect II
Ice Effect II.description: Enables loading of Freeze Ammo and Piercing Ice Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Dragon Effect I.name: Dragon Effect I
Dragon Effect I.description: Enables loading of Dragon Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Dragon Effect II.name: Dragon Effect II
Dragon Effect II.description: Enables loading of Dragon Ammo and Piercing Dragon Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Paralysis Effect I.name: Paralysis Effect I
Paralysis Effect I.description: Enables loading of Paralysis Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Paralysis Effect II.name: Paralysis Effect II
Paralysis Effect II.description: Enables loading of Paralysis Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Sleep Effect I.name: Sleep Effect I
Sleep Effect I.description: Enables loading of Sleep Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Sleep Effect II.name: Sleep Effect II
Sleep Effect II.description: Enables loading of Sleep Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Poison Effect I.name: Poison Effect I
Poison Effect I.description: Enables loading of Poison, Recovery, Demon, and Armor Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Poison Effect II.name: Poison Effect II
Poison Effect II.description: Enables loading of Poison, Recovery, Demon, and Armor Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Exhaust Effect I.name: Exhaust Effect I
Exhaust Effect I.description: Enables loading of Poison, Recovery, Demon, and Armor Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Exhaust Effect II.name: Exhaust Effect II
Exhaust Effect II.description: Enables loading of Poison, Recovery, Demon, and Armor Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

Rapid Fire (Normal).name: Rapid Fire (Normal)
Rapid Fire (Normal).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Normal Ammo 1 & 2.

Rapid Fire (Piercing).name: Rapid Fire (Piercing)
Rapid Fire (Piercing).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Pierce Ammo 1 & 2.

Rapid Fire (Spread).name: Rapid Fire (Spread)
Rapid Fire (Spread).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Spread Ammo 1 & 2.

Rapid Fire (Shrapnel).name: Rapid Fire (Shrapnel)
Rapid Fire (Shrapnel).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Shrapnel Ammo 1 & 2.

Rapid Fire (Sticky).name: Rapid Fire (Sticky)
Rapid Fire (Sticky).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Sticky Ammo 1.

Rapid Fire (Fire).name: Rapid Fire (Fire)
Rapid Fire (Fire).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Flaming Ammo and Piercing Fire Ammo.

Rapid Fire (Water).name: Rapid Fire (Water)
Rapid Fire (Water).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Water Ammo and Piercing Water Ammo.

Rapid Fire (Thunder).name: Rapid Fire (Thunder)
Rapid Fire (Thunder).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Thunder Ammo and Piercing Thunder Ammo.

Rapid Fire (Ice).name: Rapid Fire (Ice)
Rapid Fire (Ice).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Freeze Ammo and Piercing Ice Ammo.

Rapid Fire (Dragon).name: Rapid Fire (Dragon)
Rapid Fire (Dragon).description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Dragon Ammo and Piercing Dragon Ammo.

Poison Coating Boost.name: Poison Coating Boost
Poison Coating Boost.description: Strengthens Poison Coating if coatings can be applied to weapon.

Paralysis Coating Boost.name: Paralysis Coating Boost
Paralysis Coating Boost.description: Strengthens Paralysis Coating if coatings can be applied to weapon.

Sleep Coating Boost.name: Sleep Coating Boost
Sleep Coating Boost.description: Strengthens Sleep Coating if coatings can be applied to weapon.

Close-range Coating Boost.name: Close-range Coating Boost
Close-range Coating Boost.description: Strengthens Close-range Coating, but reduces Attack by 5.

Use Power Coating.name: Use Power Coating
Use Power Coating.description: Allows you to apply Power Coatings.

Use Poison Coating I.name: Use Poison Coating I
Use Poison Coating I.description: Allows you to apply Poison Coatings.

Use Poison Coating II.name: Use Poison Coating II
Use Poison Coating II.description: Allows you to apply Poison Coatings and enhances them, but reduces Attack by 5.

Use Para Coating I.name: Use Para Coating I
Use Para Coating I.description: Allows you to apply Paralysis Coatings.

Use Para Coating II.name: Use Para Coating II
Use Para Coating II.description: Allows you to apply Paralysis Coatings and enhances them, but reduces Attack by 10.

Use Sleep Coating I.name: Use Sleep Coating I
Use Sleep Coating I.description: Allows you to apply Sleep Coatings.

Use Sleep Coating II.name: Use Sleep Coating II
Use Sleep Coating II.description: Allows you to apply Sleep Coatings and enhances them, but reduces Attack by 10.

Use Blast Coating.name: Use Blast Coating
Use Blast Coating.description: Allows you to apply Blast Coatings.

Use Exhaust Coating.name: Use Exhaust Coating
Use Exhaust Coating.description: Allows you to apply Exhaust Coatings, and grants +10 Attack.

Firing: Rapid.name: Firing: Rapid
Firing: Rapid.description: Modifies weapon for Rapid-based Charged Attacks.

Firing: Pierce.name: Firing: Pierce
Firing: Pierce.description: Modifies weapon for Pierce-based Charged Attacks.

Firing: Spread.name: Firing: Spread
Firing: Spread.description: Modifies weapon for Spread-based Charged Attacks.

Firing: Charge.name: Firing: Charge
Firing: Charge.description: Modifies arrow Charge Level for Charged Attacks.

Firing: Swift.name: Firing: Swift
Firing: Swift.description: Modifies weapon for somewhat unconventional Charged Attacks.

Dulling Strike.name: Dulling Strike
Dulling Strike.description: Has a chance to increase attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

Brutal Strike.name: Brutal Strike
Brutal Strike.description: Has a chance to increase damage with a negative affinity attack.

Element Exploit.name: Element Exploit
Element Exploit.description: Increases damage when exploiting a foe's elemental weakness.

Silkbind Boost.name: Silkbind Boost
Silkbind Boost.description: Increases damage dealt using Silkbind attacks.

Defense Grinder II.name: Defense Grinder II
Defense Grinder II.description: Sharpness is slightly restored when guarding.

Hellion Mode.name: Hellion Mode
Hellion Mode.description: Attacking in Demon Mode turns every attack into a critical hit, but also doubles sharpness degredation.

Maximum Volume.name: Maximum Volume
Maximum Volume.description: Increases a performance's range of effect once it is activated.

Phial Switch Boost.name: Phial Switch Boost
Phial Switch Boost.description: Grants special effects to phials when executing morph attacks.

Lasting Arc Shot.name: Lasting Arc Shot
Lasting Arc Shot.description: Prolongs the bow's arc shot effect.

Master Rider.name: Master Rider
Master Rider.description: Increases damage inflicted by Wyvern Riding, and increases the Wyvern Riding Timer.

Wyvern Exploit.name: Wyvern Exploit
Wyvern Exploit.description: Increases damage to Bird, Flying, Brute, Piscine, and Fanged Wyverns, as well as Leviathans.

Fireblight Exploit.name: Fireblight Exploit
Fireblight Exploit.description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with fireblight.

Waterblight Exploit.name: Waterblight Exploit
Waterblight Exploit.description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with waterblight.

Thunderblight Exploit.name: Thunderblight Exploit
Thunderblight Exploit.description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with thunderblight.

Iceblight Exploit.name: Iceblight Exploit
Iceblight Exploit.description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with iceblight.

Magnamalo Soul.name: Magnamalo Soul
Magnamalo Soul.description: Increases attack when afflicted by hellfire status.

Valstrax Soul.name: Valstrax Soul
Valstrax Soul.description: Increases Dragon element attack by 20% when afflicted with dragonblight.

Chameleos Soul.name: Chameleos Soul
Chameleos Soul.description: Landing a hit will yield a small chance of boosting Health, Stamina, Attack, or Defense.

Kushala Daora Soul.name: Kushala Daora Soul
Kushala Daora Soul.description: Affinity gradually increases when continuously landing hits on foes.

Teostra Soul.name: Teostra Soul
Teostra Soul.description: Increases damage dealt by blast explosions.

Ibushi Soul.name: Ibushi Soul
Ibushi Soul.description: Enhances weapon functionality with each piece of Narwa armor you equip.

Narwa Soul.name: Narwa Soul
Narwa Soul.description: Enhances weapon functionality with each piece of Ibushi armor you equip.

Buddy Rally.name: Buddy Rally
Buddy Rally.description: Increases Palico and Palamute attack power and defense.

Spiribird Doubled.name: Spiribird Doubled
Spiribird Doubled.description: Occasionally increases the effect of Spiribirds.

Bloody Heart.name: Bloody Heart
Bloody Heart.description: During Bloodblight, attack will increase in accordance with vitality recovered by attacking. Effect ends when Bloodblight ends.
